articles.author: Sam Goodwin
articles.title: Fans spot disturbing detail in NRL's 'cardboard crowd' gimmick - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: TV viewers spotted a disturbing face in the crowd as part of the NRL's 'Fan in the Stands' promotion.
articles.content:
The NRLs fake crowd gimmick has taken a turn for the worse, with social media users spotting a disturbing detail during the Penrith Panthers and Newcastle Knights clash on Sunday.

articles.title: Newcastle Knights and Penrith Panthers play out 14-14 draw after Mitchell Pearce, Connor Watson injured - ABC News
articles.description: Newcastle lost halfback Mitchell Pearce and hooker Connor Watson in the first seven minutes and trailed 14-0, before rookies stepped up to help the team eke out a draw against Penrith.
articles.content:
Rookie hooker Chris Randall has broken a record for the most tackles on debut as the Newcastle Knights relied on their freshest faces to save them in a 14-14 draw against Penrith.
